attributes.action: Stop foreigners and immigrants claiming benefits, housing, universal credit etc.
attributes.additional_details:
Do save government and british taxpayers money
Reduce the pressure on public services like, housing, Doctors, GP,s, schools, teachers, police etc.
attributes.background: Please stop foreigners and immigrants claiming benefits and state support like universal credit, unemployment benefits, housing benefit, PIP, ESA and child benefits, etc

rejection.details: Most non-EU nationals who are subject to immigration control are already not allowed access to "public funds", which include a range of benefits that are given to people on a low income, as well as housing support. It's not clear what changes you want the Government to make to these rules.
